overview:
RewardStream is an award-winning provider of innovative marketing technologies, helping companies forge deeper connections with customers through online, in-store, mobile, and social channels.

Since 2000 RewardStream has helped clients of all sizes achieve their marketing objectives throughout the customer lifecycle, from customer acquisition and referral marketing to driving sales lift, increasing retention rates, and facilitating brand advocacy. RewardStream’s reward-based marketing solutions are fast to deploy, customizable, and highly measurable. Select client list include AT&T, Vitacost, Align Technologies, LendingTree.com, Cisco, Cuddledown, and many others.

Solutions

NEW Spark Recommendation & Referral Marketing Solution

Spark is the only hosted referral marketing solution that makes it easy for satisfied customers to make recommendations and referrals within their trusted networks. Clients can get in market quickly with a sophisticated program that tracks all referral activity from referral to close, delivering at least 3X the results of your traditional customer acquisition methods such as search, email, and affiliate marketing. Satisfied customers can connect with members of their trusted networks via Facebook, Twitter, GMAIL, Yahoo, and many other channels. While marketers get complete visibility into the value of referrals and their most influential customers.

Lifecycle Marketing Platform (LMP)

RewardStream LMP is an award-winning SaaS lifecycle marketing software platform that is the foundation of all RewardStream referral and loyalty program solutions. LMP is a flexible and extensible platform for the rapid configuration, launch and maintenance of a wide range of customer marketing programs to forge deeper connections with customers. RewardStream LMP has powered dozens of programs in multiple languages, geographies and industries since 2000. Select client list include AT&T, Vitacost, Align Technologies, LendingTree.com, Cisco, Cuddledown, and many others.
